text: Julius Johansen (born 13 September 1999) is a Danish professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . He rode in the men's team pursuit event at the 2017 UCI Track Cycling World Championships and won gold at the 2017 UCI Road World Championships in the junior men's road race. ==Major results== ===Track=== ;2017 : UCI Junior Track World Championships ::1st 20px Omnium ::1st 20px Madison (with Mathias Alexander Larsen) : UCI Track World Cup ::1st 15px Team pursuit – Cali ::2nd 15px Team pursuit – Pruszków : 2nd 15px Omnium, UEC European Track Championships ;2018 : 1st 15px Team pursuit – Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines, UCI Track World Cup : 2nd 15px Team pursuit, UCI Track World Championships ;2019 : 1st 20px Team pursuit, UEC European Track Championships : UCI Track World Cup ::1st 15px Team pursuit – Glasgow ::1st 15px Team pursuit – Minsk : 3rd 15px Team pursuit, UCI Track World Championships ;2020 : 1st 20px Team pursuit, , UCI Track Championships ===Road=== ;2016 : 1st Stage 1 Aubel–Thimister–La Gleize ;2017 : 1st 20px Road race, UCI Junior Road World Championships : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 1st 20px Overall Trofeo Karlsberg ::1st Stage 3b (ITT) : 2nd 15px Time trial, UEC European Junior Road Championships ;2018 : 1st 20px Road race, National Under–23 Road Championships : 1st 20px Overall Olympia's Tour ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st Stage 1 : 5th Overall Danmark Rundt ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2019 : 2nd Overall Tour du Loir-et-Cher ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2020 : National Under–23 Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 7th Overall Tour Poitou-Charentes en Nouvelle-Aquitaine ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male cyclists Category:Danish track cyclists Category:UCI Track Cycling World Champions (men) Category:People from Allerød Municipality
title: Julius Johansen
